sentences.sentence: Many employers, for example, will overlook occasional inefficiencies from their secretary provided she has a pleasant personality.
sentences.translation: 例如，许多雇主会忽略他们的秘书偶尔的工作效率低下，只要她有令人愉快的个性。

sentences.sentence: Though employers are backed by a chorus of remote work advocates, others note the loneliness, reduced productivity and inefficiencies of extended remote work.
sentences.translation: 尽管雇主们得到了远程工作倡导者的支持，但其他一部分人发现了长期远程工作所带来的孤独感、生产率降低和低效率。

sentences.sentence: Otherwise, there may be certain inefficiencies.
sentences.translation: 否则，可能存在某种低效性。
